 Ã‚Â³ The ultimate motorcycle racing game is back-and totally customizable!     Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³ Build your own tracks with the new 3D track creator and share them with   Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³ your friends. Feel the adrenaline rush of high-speed racing with improved Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³ graphics and more 3-D acceleration. Choose a tire smokin' superbike or a  Ã‚Â³
 Ã‚Â³ rugged motorcross bike and hang on for the ride of your life!             Ã‚Â³
